data.text: @rosellacottage @MaizyDaizyZzzz They were all built to syphon off public funds
@IanBlandThatsMe @rosellacottage You best pop back in time and do better...
@rosellacottage Let us not forget that Florence Nightingale actually increased the death rate among her patients due to wandering around with a lamp instead of getting the sewers fixed.

@rosellacottage @maggiemay2149 I know my sisters friend who went for a scan at Harrogate. Whether it was in just a small section I don’t know but it certainly wasn’t open for very long. She should have gone to Leeds General Infirmary but as you know they weren’t seeing anyone.

@maggiemay2149 @G55Pam The Manchester and Leeds Nightingales stood empty apart from security patrols for 2 years

Not a single patient ever attended any of them
@G55Pam @rosellacottage The Exeter & Glasgow Nightingales were used too but not for Covid patients.
@rosellacottage Probably the beds & equipment were what they used for the NHS set at 2012 Olympic opening ceremony. Not heard any mention of the new hubs  being used either.
@monkeymonk2012 @rosellacottage Real beds not required for mannequins though 👀
@rosellacottage None of the beds supplied were any good either as they couldn’t be used in real hospitals.

@rosellacottage Mates getting rich from building them, then other mates doing the same to take them apart.
What happens to the equipment bought at huge cost ?
